Electrical, Battery 08

BATTERY, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R battery box cover

Excludes:
1. BATTERY / BATTERY CABLE, DIAGNOSTIC

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One Battery A08-3140 Other Models 0.4
One Battery A08-3141 CF 500/600 0.3

Addon If Required   Code Applies To Hours
BATTERY, Replace        
2 or more A08-3140-1 Models, ALL 0.1

BATTERY / BATTERY CABLE, Diagnostics

Includes:
1. Perform battery load test
2. Perform voltage drop test
3. Check alternator output

Notes:
1. Not to be used in conjunction with alternator or starter diagnostics

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A08-3145 Models, ALL 0.5

BATTERY BOX COVER, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A08-3200 Models, ALL 0.3

BATTERY BOX OR TRAY, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R air tanks when required

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A08-3190 4200 0.9
A08-3190 4300 0.9
A08-3190 4400 0.9
A08-3190 8500 0.9
A08-3191 7000 0.7
A08-3192 8600 1.1
A08-3193 CF 500/600 0.6

Addon If Required   Code Applies To Hours
WITH BATTERY BOX MOUNTED AIR TANKS,        
For tanks mounted underside of box A08-3190-1 Models, ALL 0.6

BATTERY CABLE TERMINAL, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One Terminal A08-180 Models, ALL 0.3
Each Additional A08-181 Models, ALL 0.2

BATTERY GROUND CABLE, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Excludes:
1. BATTERY / BATTERY CABLE, DIAGNOSTIC

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A08-3150 Other Models 0.4
A08-3151 CF 500/600 0.6

BATTERY HOLD DOWN CLAMP (RETAINER), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A08-3210 Models, ALL 0.4

BATTERY TO BATTERY CABLE (MULTIPLE BATTERIES), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Excludes:
1. BATTERY / BATTERY CABLE, DIAGNOSTIC

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One or All cable(s) A08-3170 Models, ALL 0.3

BATTERY TO STARTER CABLE, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Excludes:
1. BATTERY / BATTERY CABLE, DIAGNOSTIC

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A08-3160 Other Models 0.5
A08-3161 CF 500/600 0.6

WARRANTY OPERATIONS NOT COVERED IN THIS SECTION, T-Time

Notes:
1. This is not to be used to code diagnosis, testing or cleaning of operations already covered in this section. The time for those items is included in the operation. A written description or explanation must accompany each

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
T-TIME A08-T1 Models, ALL 0.0
T-TIME A08-T2 Models, ALL 0.0
T-TIME A08-T3 Models, ALL 0.0
